A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
First third of the movie is liberal man bashing
2nd third is a bunch of bad CGI that seems to pay homage to the prequels 
3rd third (??) is actually lots of awesome action and finally feels like a Star Wars movie
Rian Johnson puts on a visually pleasing and fun movie. I'm wondering if the producers forced a certain narrative on him for the first part of this film.
